agent_actions_localised_action_descripti.value_original: [[col:yellow]]Increases the amount of [[img:icon_corruption_chs]][[/img]]Chaos corruption in the local province by %n.[[/col]]
agent_actions_localised_action_descripti.value_translated: [[col:yellow]]Aumenta la cantidad de [[img:icon_corruption_chs]][[/img]]Corrupción del Caos Absoluto en la provincia local en %n.[[/col]]

agent_culture_details_description_text_1.value_original: The Bull Centaur Taur'ruks and Hobgoblin Khans constitute the lieutenants of the Dawi Zharr armies, keeping the order among the ranks.
agent_culture_details_description_text_1.value_translated: Los Centauros Enanos Taur'ruk y Khans Hobgoblin son los lugartenientes de los ejércitos de los Dawi Zharr, manteniendo el orden entre las filas.

agent_culture_details_description_text_7.value_original: Orcs are led by the biggest and brawniest of their kind.
agent_culture_details_description_text_7.value_translated: Los orcos están dirigidos por los más grandes y fornidos de su especie.

agent_recruitment_categories_onscreen_de.value_original: The leaders of the Spider Kults are even more cunning than the regular Goblin Warbosses.
agent_recruitment_categories_onscreen_de.value_translated: Los líderes del Kulto de la Araña son incluso más astutos que los Kaudillos Goblins habituales.

agent_recruitment_categories_onscreen_de.value_original: The Savage Orc leaders typically bear the most impressive warpaint or take the tribal customs to the most extreme level.
agent_recruitment_categories_onscreen_de.value_translated: Los líderes de los Orcos Salvajes suelen llevar la pintura de guerra más impresionante o llevar las costumbres tribales al nivel más extremo.

agent_subtypes_description_text_override.value_original: To be a Battle Wizard is to understand the power at the heart of the world, though such power is not weilded lightly.
The bigger and nastier Bull Centaurs lead the stampede into battle.
agent_subtypes_description_text_override.value_translated: Los Centauros Enanos más grandes y desagradables lideran la estampida hacia la batalla.

agent_subtypes_description_text_override.value_original: Only a few Khans grow strong enough to lead an army of Hobgoblins; even less those that manage to command Chaos Dwarf warriors as well.
agent_subtypes_description_text_override.value_translated: Sólo unos pocos Khan se vuelven lo suficientemente fuertes como para liderar un ejército de Hobgoblins; y muchos menos son además capaces de comandar un ejército de los Enanos del Caos.

agent_subtypes_description_text_override.value_original: Occasionally the spiteful infighting within the ranks of the Hobgoblins will give birth to a successful and feared killer who will rise to prominence and be known as Khan.
agent_subtypes_description_text_override.value_translated: Ocasionalmente, las rencorosas luchas internas dentro de las filas de los Hobgoblins darán origen a un exitoso y temido asesino que se alzará y será conocido como Khan.

agent_subtypes_description_text_override.value_original: Only a few Khans grow strong enough to lead an army of Hobgoblins; even less those that manage to command Chaos Dwarf warriors as well.
agent_subtypes_description_text_override.value_translated: Sólo unos pocos Khan se vuelven lo suficientemente fuertes como para liderar un ejército de Hobgoblins; y muchos menos son además capaces de comandar un ejército de los Enanos del Caos.

agent_subtypes_description_text_override.value_original: The Jarl is the most battle hardened veteran of his group and often a lesser clan chieftain of his tribe.
agent_subtypes_description_text_override.value_translated: El Jarl es el veterano más curtido en la batalla de su grupo y a menudo un jefe de clan menor de su tribu.

agent_subtypes_description_text_override.value_original: The leaders of the Spider Kults are even more cunning than the regular Goblin Warbosses.
agent_subtypes_description_text_override.value_translated: Los líderes del Kulto de la Araña son incluso más astutos que los Kaudillos Goblins habituales.

agent_subtypes_description_text_override.value_original: Orcs are led by the biggest and brawniest of their kind.
agent_subtypes_description_text_override.value_translated: Los Orcos están dirigidos por los más grandes y fornidos de su especie.

agent_subtypes_description_text_override.value_original: Bound in huge bulging muscles, the Savage Orc Big Boss wades through battle hacking off heads and limbs.
agent_subtypes_description_text_override.value_translated: Con sus enormes músculos abultados, el Gran Jefe Orco Zalvaje entra en la batalla cortando cabezas y extremidades.

agent_subtypes_description_text_override.value_original: The Savage Orc leaders typically bear the most impressive warpaint or take the tribal customs to the most extreme level.
agent_subtypes_description_text_override.value_translated: Los líderes de los Orcos Salvajes suelen llevar la pintura de guerra más impresionante o llevar las costumbres tribales al nivel más extremo.

ancillaries_colour_text_wh_dlc05_anc_mou.value_original: Barded horses offer greater protection, a large horse is needed to support the armour, usually purchased from massive breeds found in the Empire.
Imperial pegasi are found in Grey Mountains where Bretonnian and Empire hunters fight over capturing the foals.
An officer will often require a reliable stallion to transport him across the battlefield to where he is needed most.

ancillaries_colour_text_wh_main_anc_moun.value_original: "Da Khan getz da biggest barka', nuff sed."
ancillaries_colour_text_wh_main_anc_moun.value_translated: "Er Khan conzigue al que maz ladra, y zacabó".

ancillaries_colour_text_wh_main_anc_moun.value_original: Tainted and savage they may be, but these behemoths remain willing to bear high-status Marauders into battle, trampling flat everything foolish enough to get in their way.
ancillaries_colour_text_wh_main_anc_moun.value_translated: Puede que sean salvajes y corruptos, pero estos monstruos están dispuestos a acompañar a los Bárbaros más prestigiosos a la batalla, pisoteando a todo aquel lo bastante lerdo como para interponerse en su camino.

ancillaries_colour_text_wh_main_anc_moun.value_original: The horses of Norsca live for battle, even choosing to graze on the bones of the fallen over grass.
ancillaries_colour_text_wh_main_anc_moun.value_translated: Los caballos de Norsca viven para la batalla, llegando incluso a elegir como pasto los huesos de los caídos.

ancillaries_colour_text_wh_main_anc_moun.value_original: When fully grown, these Gigantic Spiders are prized as revered mounts for a Goblin tribe's mightiest warriors.
ancillaries_colour_text_wh_main_anc_moun.value_translated: Cuando están completamente desarrolladas, estas arañas gigantes son apreciadas como monturas veneradas por los guerreros más poderosos de los Goblins.

ancillaries_colour_text_wh_main_anc_moun.value_original: Giant Spiders are deadly hunters, easily capable of ensnaring and overwhelming a fully-grown man.
ancillaries_colour_text_wh_main_anc_moun.value_translated: Las Arañas Gigantes son cazadoras mortales, fácilmente capaces de atrapar y abrumar a un hombre adulto.

ancillaries_colour_text_wh_main_anc_moun.value_original: The War Boars can be found almost exclusively in the harsh rugged regions of the Badlands.
ancillaries_colour_text_wh_main_anc_moun.value_translated: El Jabalí de Guerra se encuentra casi únicamente en las regiones escarpadas de las Tierras Yermas.

ancillaries_colour_text_wh_main_anc_moun.value_original: The War Boars can be found almost exclusively in the harsh rugged regions of the Badlands.
ancillaries_colour_text_wh_main_anc_moun.value_translated: El Jabalí de Guerra se encuentra casi únicamente en las regiones escarpadas de las Tierras Yermas.

ancillaries_colour_text_wh_main_anc_moun.value_original: The War Boars can be found almost exclusively in the harsh rugged regions of the Badlands.
ancillaries_colour_text_wh_main_anc_moun.value_translated: El Jabalí de Guerra se encuentra casi únicamente en las regiones escarpadas de las Tierras Yermas.

ancillaries_colour_text_wh_main_anc_moun.value_original: Wyverns are highly-prized mounts for the most powerful of Orc Warlords.
ancillaries_colour_text_wh_main_anc_moun.value_translated: Las Serpientes Aladas son monturas muy apreciadas por los Kaudillos Orcos más poderosos.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_original: Oi! De'z gits iz funny! Good use ov da dookie!
Yuck! Dem lookin' tasty, rite? Le'z eat!

character_skill_node_sets_enc_title_wh2_.value_translated: Habilidades del Chamán de Piel Hobgoblin

character_skill_node_sets_enc_title_wh_m.value_translated: Habilidades del Gran Jefe Orco Zalvaje

character_skills_localised_description_d.value_original: Able to move a horde in ways and at speeds unlike any Chaos Dwarf leader, Bull Centaurs excel at catching enemies off guard.
character_skills_localised_description_d.value_translated: Capaces de mover una horda de maneras y a velocidades diferentes a las de cualquier líder de los Enanos del Caos, los Centauros Enanos destacan por tomar a los enemigos con la guardia baja.

character_skills_localised_description_d.value_original: Fearsome blessings of strength that often come with extra fangs or horns.
character_skills_localised_description_d.value_translated: Temibles bendiciones de fuerza que a menudo vienen con colmillos o cuernos adicionales.

character_skills_localised_description_d.value_original: The loyalty that gifts of change buy is almost incomprehensible by the innocent.
character_skills_localised_description_d.value_translated: La lealtad que se compra con regalos de cambio es casi incomprensible para los inocentes.

character_skills_localised_description_d.value_original: Hashut protects his champions well, all the better to spread his dominion.
character_skills_localised_description_d.value_translated: Hashut protege bien a sus campeones, mientras que sirvan para extender su dominio.

character_skills_localised_description_d.value_original: The children of the Dark Father will seek his vengeance eternally.
character_skills_localised_description_d.value_translated: Los hijos del Padre Oscuro buscarán su venganza eternamente.

character_skills_localised_description_d.value_original: A penchant for killing via trampling under hoof.
character_skills_localised_description_d.value_translated: Una inclinación por matar pisoteando bajo la herradura.

character_skills_localised_description_d.value_original: Bull Centaurs are often considered the chosen of Hashut, and as such gain his favour in many ways.
character_skills_localised_description_d.value_translated: Los Centauros Enanos a menudo son considerados los elegidos de Hashut y, como tales, se ganan su favor de muchas maneras.

character_skills_localised_description_d.value_original: Dis greenie knows how to shoot.
character_skills_localised_description_d.value_translated: Ezte novato zabe dizparar.

character_skills_localised_description_d.value_original: All the followers of the dark gods can be deserving of their blessings, no matter their size.
character_skills_localised_description_d.value_translated: Todos los seguidores de los dioses oscuros pueden ser merecedores de sus bendiciones, sin importar su tamaño.

character_skills_localised_description_d.value_original: "Slaves to the darkness, beasts of prey, arise!!"
character_skills_localised_description_d.value_translated: "¡¡Esclavos de la oscuridad, bestias de presa, levantaos!!"

character_skills_localised_description_d.value_original: The Dark Father's dominance is absolute.
character_skills_localised_description_d.value_translated: El dominio del Padre Oscuro es absoluto.

character_skills_localised_description_d.value_original: These lands are home to the cunning Hobgoblins; no-one dares to pass unprepared.
character_skills_localised_description_d.value_translated: Estas tierras son el hogar de los astutos Hobgoblins. Nadie se atreve a pasar sin prepararse con antelación.

character_skills_localised_description_d.value_original: This Khan and his followers have excelled in hiding in plain sight.
character_skills_localised_description_d.value_translated: Este Khan y sus seguidores se han destacado por ocultarse a plena vista.

character_skills_localised_description_d.value_original: Respect can be hard enough to earn when you aren't 4 feet tall, but from small beginnings can come great things.
character_skills_localised_description_d.value_translated: El respeto puede ser bastante difícil de ganar cuando no mides más de un metro de altura, pero desde pequeños comienzos pueden surgir grandes cosas.

character_skills_localised_description_d.value_original: Scouting just becomes second nature to those experienced in it.
character_skills_localised_description_d.value_translated: Explorar se convierte en una segunda naturaleza para quienes lo hacen a menudo.

character_skills_localised_description_d.value_original: Often tasked with suicidal assassination missions, many Hobgolins spend their time training for ways to live through such tasks.
character_skills_localised_description_d.value_translated: A menudo encargados de misiones de asesinatos suicidas, muchos Hobgolins dedican su tiempo a entrenar formas de vivir entre asesinatos.

character_skills_localised_description_d.value_original: Hobgoblins are capable of enslaving or taming monsters of various types, learning how to lose the least amount of soldiers in the process is the key.
character_skills_localised_description_d.value_translated: Los hobgoblins son capaces de esclavizar o domesticar monstruos de varios tipos, la clave es aprender a perder la menor cantidad de soldados en el proceso.

character_skills_localised_description_d.value_original: Respected and feared... By other Hobgoblins of course.
character_skills_localised_description_d.value_translated: Respetado y temido... Por otros Hobgoblins, por supuesto.

character_skills_localised_description_d.value_original: Often having been slaves themselves, Hobgoblins are known to employ various tactics in the Dawi Zharr armies.
character_skills_localised_description_d.value_translated: Habiendo sido a menudo esclavos, se sabe que los Hobgoblins emplean diversas tácticas en los ejércitos de los Dawi Zharr.

character_skills_localised_description_d.value_original: Tainted and savage they may be, but these behemoths remain willing to bear high-status Marauders into battle, trampling flat everything foolish enough to get in their way.
character_skills_localised_description_d.value_translated: Puede que sean salvajes y corruptos, pero estos monstruos están dispuestos a acompañar a los Bárbaros más prestigiosos a la batalla, pisoteando a todo aquel lo bastante lerdo como para interponerse en su camino.

character_skills_localised_description_d.value_original: The horses of Norsca live for battle, even choosing to graze on the bones of the fallen over grass.
character_skills_localised_description_d.value_translated: Los caballos de Norsca viven para la batalla, llegando incluso a elegir como pasto los huesos de los caídos.

character_skills_localised_description_g.value_original: The battle-hardened Big Bosses are known for their brutal attacks.
character_skills_localised_description_g.value_translated: Los Grandes Jefes endurecidos por la batalla son conocidos por sus brutales ataques.

character_skills_localised_description_g.value_original: The ferocity of Savage Orc Big Bosses in battle is unmatched.
character_skills_localised_description_g.value_translated: La ferocidad del Gran Jefe Orco Zalvaje en la batalla es incomparable.

character_skills_localised_description_h.value_original: All finally know your worth, but much more is still to be proven.
character_skills_localised_description_h.value_translated: Todos finalmente saben lo que vales, pero aún queda mucho por demostrar.

character_skills_localised_description_h.value_original: Maintaining power can be done in various ways, fear of assassination and torture is certainly one way.
character_skills_localised_description_h.value_translated: Mantener el poder se puede lograr de varias maneras; el miedo al asesinato y la tortura es sin duda una de ellas.

character_skills_localised_description_h.value_original: The secret and rare magics of the greenskin slaves can somewhat harnessed by those ascertain respect and admiration, and with the patience to learn.
character_skills_localised_description_h.value_translated: Las magias secretas y raras de los esclavos pieles verdes pueden ser aprovechadas de alguna manera por aquellos que obtienen respeto y admiración, y con la paciencia para aprender.

character_skills_localised_description_h.value_original: A Khan of the volcano tribes, well known and well respected by the Dawi-Zharr and the Dark Father.
character_skills_localised_description_h.value_translated: Un Khan de las tribus volcánicas, muy conocido y respetado por los Dawi-Zharr y el Padre Oscuro.

character_skills_localised_description_w.value_original: "Let's get 'em, boyz!"
"Take no prisoners, boyz!"
Wargors hold a deep, savage control over their underlings.
character_skills_localised_description_w.value_translated: Los Beligors tienen un control profundo y salvaje sobre sus subordinados.

character_skills_localised_description_w.value_original: "I... See... Man-filth..."
The Forest Goblins worship the Spiders as Gods of the Forest.
character_skills_localised_description_w.value_translated: Los Goblins Silvanos adoran a las arañas como dioses del bosque.

character_skills_localised_description_w.value_original: Like all sneaky gits, dis Khan is "a bad piece o' work" – when he stabs he really means it.
character_skills_localised_description_w.value_translated: Como tos los ezcurridizoz, ezte Khan ez "una mala pieza": cuando apuñala, lo haze en zerio.

character_skills_localised_description_w.value_original: A general's horse can be their most trusted and daring companion. Just don't name him 'Daisy'.
Dark times call for need of magic forces on the side of light.
An Imperial pegasus is a noble, winged steed, intelligent and loyal.
A general's horse can be their most trusted and daring companion. Just don't name him 'Daisy'.
The gathering of Wizards brings much needed wisdom, knowledge and vision on the battlefield.
"Da Khan getz da biggest barka', nuff sed."
character_skills_localised_description_w.value_translated: "Er Khan conzigue al que maz ladra, y zacabó".

character_skills_localised_description_w.value_original: When fully grown, these Gigantic Spiders are prized as revered mounts for a Goblin tribe's mightiest warriors.
character_skills_localised_description_w.value_translated: Cuando están completamente desarrolladas, estas arañas gigantes son apreciadas como monturas veneradas por los guerreros más poderosos de los Goblins.

character_skills_localised_description_w.value_original: Giant Spiders are deadly hunters, easily capable of ensnaring and overwhelming a fully-grown man.
character_skills_localised_description_w.value_translated: Las Arañas Gigantes son cazadoras mortales, fácilmente capaces de atrapar y abrumar a un hombre adulto.

character_skills_localised_description_w.value_original: The Shamans mark the Savage Orc bodies and weapons with tribal warpaint and tattoos using a strong magical concoction.
character_skills_localised_description_w.value_translated: Los chamanes marcan los cuerpos y las armas de los Orcoz Zalvajez con pintura de guerra tribal y tatuajes utilizando una fuerte mezcla mágica.

character_skills_localised_description_w.value_original: While locating enough paint for the job ain't easy, no one can deny the results!
character_skills_localised_description_w.value_translated: Aunque no es fácil encontrar suficiente pintura para el trabajo, ¡nadie puede negar los resultados!

character_skills_localised_description_w.value_original: No need for 'smarts' or thinkin' like a Goblin. Just smash 'em harder; that's the Orc-y way!
character_skills_localised_description_w.value_translated: No haze falta zer lizto o penzar como un goblin. Dalez maz duro y ya tá. ¡Azí ez como lo hacen loz orcoz!

character_skills_localised_description_w.value_original: A belligerent threat to all lumbering communities, the Forest Goblins often compete with other forest-dwelling races for territorial supremacy.
character_skills_localised_description_w.value_translated: Una amenaza beligerante para todas las comunidades madereras, los Goblins Silvanos a menudo compiten con otras razas que viven en los bosques por la supremacía territorial.

character_skills_localised_description_w.value_original: These Savage Orcs, and the Warboars that bear them, give no quarter on the battlefield.
character_skills_localised_description_w.value_translated: Estos Orcoz Zalvajez y los Jabalíes de Guerra que montan no dan cuartel en el campo de batalla.

character_skills_localised_description_w.value_original: The War Boars can be found almost exclusively in the harsh rugged regions of the Badlands.
character_skills_localised_description_w.value_translated: El Jabalí de Guerra se encuentra casi únicamente en las regiones escarpadas de las Tierras Yermas.

character_skills_localised_description_w.value_original: The War Boars can be found almost exclusively in the harsh rugged regions of the Badlands.
character_skills_localised_description_w.value_translated: El Jabalí de Guerra se encuentra casi únicamente en las regiones escarpadas de las Tierras Yermas.

character_skills_localised_description_w.value_original: The War Boars can be found almost exclusively in the harsh rugged regions of the Badlands.
character_skills_localised_description_w.value_translated: El Jabalí de Guerra se encuentra casi únicamente en las regiones escarpadas de las Tierras Yermas.

character_skills_localised_description_w.value_original: Wyverns are highly-prized mounts for the most powerful of Orc Warlords.
character_skills_localised_description_w.value_translated: Las Serpientes Aladas son monturas muy apreciadas por los Kaudillos Orcos más poderosos.

character_skills_localised_name_hob_grea.value_translated: El más grande de los Khan

dilemmas_localised_description_poop_ride.value_original: The local snotlings have taken to riding the "unique" wildlife thriving in the piles of trash that litter your warcamp. They now roam joyfully, if noisily, around your army. It could be amusing to send them right at the next enemy. Or they could make a tasty snack while keeping your boyz busy instead of bickering.

effect_bundles_localised_description_poo.value_original: New entertainment keep the boys busy and the infighting away

loading_screen_quotes_bulletpoints_deco_.value_translated: Más eficaz en asedios||[[img:ui/skins/default/modifier_icon_armour_piercing.png]][[/img]]Perforante||[[img:ui/skins/default/modifier_icon_bonus_vs_infantry.png]][[/img]]Eficaz contra infantería||[[img:ui/battle ui/ability_icons/causes_terror.png]][[/img]]Causa terror

loading_screen_quotes_description_dec_be.value_original: Blessed with spectacular horns and raw physical power, Bestigors put others of their kind to shame.
loading_screen_quotes_description_dec_be.value_translated: Bendecidos con cuernos espectaculares y poder físico puro, los Bestigors superan con creces a otros de su especie.

loading_screen_quotes_description_dec_go.value_original: Grabbing the nearest heavy weapon, the Gors are sent into the fray with animalistic rage.
loading_screen_quotes_description_dec_go.value_translated: Agarrando el arma pesada más cercana, los Gors se lanzan a la refriega con una rabia animal.

loading_screen_quotes_description_dec_hu.value_original: Indiscriminate hunters who dedicate their lives to the Savage Huntress.
loading_screen_quotes_description_dec_hu.value_translated: Cazadoras indiscriminadas que dedican su vida a la Cazadora Salvaje.

loading_screen_quotes_description_dec_ma.value_original: Primordial and ferocious creatures, Magma Dragons are amongst the most malevolent and reclusive of the Dragon race.
loading_screen_quotes_description_dec_ma.value_translated: Criaturas primordiales y feroces, los Dragones de Magma se encuentran entre los más malévolos y solitarios de la raza Dragón.

loading_screen_quotes_description_dec_to.value_original: A few Dark Elves choose to remain as Black Guard beyond the 200 years. The greatest of these are called the Tower Masters.
loading_screen_quotes_description_dec_to.value_translated: Unos pocos Elfos Oscuros deciden permanecer como Guardia Negra después de los 200 años. Los mejores son los llamados Maestros de la Torre.

loading_screen_quotes_description_deco_b.value_original: The hardest-hitting mobs in a tribe, Big 'Uns are well placed in melee, where they happily smash their enemies apart.
loading_screen_quotes_description_deco_b.value_translated: Los Grandotez, los que más duros atizan de la tribu, están bien preparados para el combate cuerpo a cuerpo, donde felizmente destrozan a sus enemigos.

loading_screen_quotes_description_deco_b.value_original: Give a Black Orc two weapons, and watch the carnage they create double itself.
loading_screen_quotes_description_deco_b.value_translated: Dale dos armas a un Orco Negro y observa cómo la masacre que crea se duplica.

loading_screen_quotes_description_deco_b.value_original: "Now den, sum times what da boyz need is a lad what can take a beating, and beat back! A lad wif a serious pair of tusks! Dem need a Black Orc!"
loading_screen_quotes_description_deco_b.value_translated: "A vecez lo que un chico necezita ez otro chico al que darle una paliza, ¡y que zea capaz de devolverla! ¡Un chico con un buen par de colmilloz! ¡Necezitan un Orco Negro!"

loading_screen_quotes_description_deco_b.value_original: Bugman’s Rangers put the tankards of his fine ale to good - albeit sometimes strange - use, like with these hurling machines.

loading_screen_quotes_description_deco_c.value_original: Although crude and primitive compared to the arsenals of the Chaos Dwarfs, Hobgoblin spear chukkas can provide effective ranged support.
loading_screen_quotes_description_deco_c.value_translated: Aunque toscos y primitivos en comparación con los arsenales de los Enanos del Caos, los Lanzapinchoz Hobgoblin pueden proporcionar un apoyo a distancia eficaz.

loading_screen_quotes_description_deco_c.value_original: A rare breed of trolls that have been seen only in the Dark Lands.
loading_screen_quotes_description_deco_c.value_translated: Una raza rara de trolls que sólo se ha visto en las Tierras Oscuras.

loading_screen_quotes_description_deco_c.value_original: Ogres make good slaves for the Pits, and if needed they can be sent to the battlefield for brute force.
loading_screen_quotes_description_deco_c.value_translated: Los ogros son buenos esclavos para los Pozos y, si es necesario, pueden ser enviados al campo de batalla para usar su fuerza bruta.

loading_screen_quotes_description_deco_c.value_original: Crossbow regiments that provide ranged support to the shock troops and massed slaves that predominate the Dawi Zharr armies.
loading_screen_quotes_description_deco_c.value_translated: Regimientos de ballestas que brindan apoyo a distancia a las tropas de choque y esclavos en masa que predominan en los ejércitos de los Dawi Zharr.

loading_screen_quotes_description_deco_c.value_original: Also known as Hobyars, the nobles of the Mourngul Khanate are the only ones permitted to ride the carefully domesticated Hobhounds.
loading_screen_quotes_description_deco_c.value_translated: También conocidos como Hobyars, los nobles del Khanato Fúnebre son los únicos a los que se les permite montar los Hobsabuesos cuidadosamente domesticados.

loading_screen_quotes_description_deco_c.value_original: These hulking behemoths combine the strength of the Giant race with the nigh-impenetrable armour of their masters.
loading_screen_quotes_description_deco_c.value_translated: Estos gigantes descomunales combinan la fuerza de la raza Gigante con la armadura casi impenetrable de sus amos.

loading_screen_quotes_description_deco_d.value_original: With howls of doom on their lips, they throw themselves into the fray, heedless of danger or injury.

loading_screen_quotes_description_deco_h.value_original: Outfitted in heavy, well-polished Dwarf mail, Hammerers wade into combat swinging their hammers in sweeping arcs.

loading_screen_quotes_description_deco_i.value_original: Each if these Irondrakes carries a pair of finely tuned Drake Pistols, with mechanisms that are still a mystery to Imperial engineers.
Clad in heavy plate armour and armed with master-wrought blackpowder firearms, they are one of the most widely respected and well-equipped handgunner regiments.

loading_screen_quotes_description_deco_k.value_original: Averlanders consider the Knights Black Lynx the elite of the elite among the Mountain Guard, stationed within Black Fire Pass.

loading_screen_quotes_description_deco_n.value_original: Young and inexperienced, the Bondsmen are loyal warriors who are usually in the service of a particular Jarl.
loading_screen_quotes_description_deco_n.value_translated: Jóvenes e inexpertos, los Mozuelos son guerreros leales que suelen estar al servicio de un Jarl en particular.

loading_screen_quotes_description_deco_n.value_original: Fierce men who earned a place in the hall of a Chieftain who values their skill in combat.
loading_screen_quotes_description_deco_n.value_translated: Hombres feroces que se ganaron un lugar en el salón de un caudillo que valora su habilidad en el combate.

loading_screen_quotes_description_deco_n.value_original: Legends speak of a rare variation of this horrible creature, that prefers to live in the dark and frozen caverns of the North.
loading_screen_quotes_description_deco_n.value_translated: Las leyendas hablan de una rara variante de esta horrible criatura, que prefiere vivir en las oscuras y heladas cavernas del Norte.

loading_screen_quotes_description_deco_n.value_original: Respected by the Jarls of many Norse clans, the Shield Maidens are deadly warriors swift of movement and of blade.
loading_screen_quotes_description_deco_n.value_translated: Respetadas por los jarls de muchos clanes norses, las Doncellas Escuderas son guerreras mortales, rápidas de movimiento y de espada.

loading_screen_quotes_description_deco_n.value_original: Among the most feared mariners are the Norse Reavers, brutal warriors who plunder the coastlines.
loading_screen_quotes_description_deco_n.value_translated: Entre los marineros más temidos están los Corsarios Norse, guerreros brutales que saquean las costas.

loading_screen_quotes_description_deco_o.value_original: Also known as Great Beards, the Old Guard are the oldest and wisest among the dwarf clans.
Orc Boyz call every weapon a "choppa" even the long pointy-ones.
loading_screen_quotes_description_deco_o.value_translated: Los Guerreroz Orcoz llaman a todas las armas "choppa", incluso las largas y puntiagudas.

loading_screen_quotes_description_deco_p.value_original: Experienced miners, the Prospectors can dig tunnels with impressive speed and accuracy.

loading_screen_quotes_description_deco_s.value_original: The true elite of the Savage Orcs. Wielding large bone clubs to crack some skullz.
loading_screen_quotes_description_deco_s.value_translated: La verdadera élite de los Orcoz Zalvajez. Usan grandes garrotes de hueso para cascar craneoz.

loading_screen_quotes_description_deco_s.value_original: If a giant finds itself among a horde of savage orcs it will usually adopt their customs and be given their war paints.
loading_screen_quotes_description_deco_s.value_translated: Si un gigante se encuentra entre una horda de orcoz zalvajez, normalmente adoptará sus costumbres y recibirá sus pinturas de guerra.

loading_screen_quotes_description_deco_s.value_original: Even with primitive wooden shields and spears reinforced with bone, these savage brutes are "readi for 'scrappin".
loading_screen_quotes_description_deco_s.value_translated: Incluso con primitivos escudos de madera y lanzas reforzadas con hueso, estos brutos salvajes están "listoz pa desguazar".

loading_screen_quotes_description_grn_ar.value_original: The ability to skewer several creatures from a distance appeals greatly to the violent and bloody nature of any greenskin.

loading_screen_quotes_description_str_ur.value_original: Goblins of higher standing use three wolves to pull their chariots.

loading_screen_quotes_title_dec_gor_grea.value_translated: Rebaño de Gors (armas a dos manos)

loading_screen_quotes_title_deco_savage_.value_translated: Grandotez Orcoz Zalvajez (armas a dos manos)

mercenary_unit_groups_replenishment_reas.value_original: This unit is replenished during an event

rituals_display_name_wh3_dlc23_chd_ritua.value_translated: Acólitos y Juramentados de Hierro Infernales

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums_tooltip_darkf.value_original: The Daemonsmiths have infused twisted runes and malign spirits in these weapons.
ui_unit_bullet_point_enums_tooltip_darkf.value_translated: Los Herreros Demoníacos han infundido runas retorcidas y espíritus malignos en estas armas.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums_tooltip_deco_.value_original: "We are the true sons of Grungni, young beardlings, remember that!"
A special technique of the Shield Maidens.
ui_unit_bullet_point_enums_tooltip_deco_.value_translated: Una técnica especial de las Doncellas Escuderas.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums_tooltip_deco_.value_original: Devastating attacks that come at a cost of losing focus.
ui_unit_bullet_point_enums_tooltip_deco_.value_translated: Ataques devastadores, pero a costa de perder la concentración.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums_tooltip_deco_.value_original: Experts at digging swiftly and bombarding the enemies with special kind of bombs.
Most effective in sieges, the Chaos Siege Giants can bring down even the most fortified gates and walls.
ui_unit_bullet_point_enums_tooltip_deco_.value_translated: Más eficaces en asedios, los Gigantes de Asedio del Caos pueden derribar incluso las puertas y muros más fortificados.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums_tooltip_drago.value_original: Magma Dragons are capable of producing a sulfurous poisoned flame said to be amongst the strongest of all Dragon breaths.
ui_unit_bullet_point_enums_tooltip_drago.value_translated: Los Dragones de Magma tienen la capacidad de lanzar una llama envenenada con azufre que inflige quemaduras horribles, se dice que es uno de los más fuertes de todos los Alientos de Dragón.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums_tooltip_honey.value_original: The Lammasu can call out other creatures to do its bidding.
ui_unit_bullet_point_enums_tooltip_honey.value_translated: El Lammasu puede llamar a otras criaturas para que cumplan sus órdenes.

ui_unit_groupings_tooltip_deco_chd_bull_.value_original: Brutal and bloodthirsty beasts, striding into battle to wreak havoc.
ui_unit_groupings_tooltip_deco_chd_bull_.value_translated: Bestias brutales y sedientas de sangre que se lanzan a la batalla para sembrar el caos.

ui_unit_groupings_tooltip_deco_chd_hobgo.value_original: A successful and feared killer risen to prominence.
ui_unit_groupings_tooltip_deco_chd_hobgo.value_translated: Un asesino exitoso y temido que se hizo famoso.

ui_unit_groupings_tooltip_deco_grn_orc_b.value_original: Orcs are led by the biggest and brawniest of their kind.
ui_unit_groupings_tooltip_deco_grn_orc_b.value_translated: Los orcos están dirigidos por los más grandes y fornidos de su especie.

ui_unit_groupings_tooltip_deco_grn_orc_b.value_original: Orcs are led by the biggest and brawniest of their kind.
ui_unit_groupings_tooltip_deco_grn_orc_b.value_translated: Los orcos están dirigidos por los más grandes y fornidos de su especie.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_bst_rallying.value_original: Wargors hold a deep, savage control over their underlings.
unit_abilities_tooltip_text_bst_rallying.value_translated: Los Beligors tienen un control profundo y salvaje sobre sus subordinados.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_chd_bound_sp.value_original: The Lammasu calls out to a creature of the Dark Lands with an insidious charisma, leaving it befuddled and suggestible to its cunning manipulations.
unit_abilities_tooltip_text_chd_bound_sp.value_translated: El Lammasu llama a una criatura de las Tierras Oscuras con un carisma insidioso, dejándola desconcertada y sugestionable ante sus astutas manipulaciones.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_dec_magma_dr.value_original: A sulfurous poisoned flame that inflicts horrific burns.
unit_abilities_tooltip_text_dec_magma_dr.value_translated: Una llama envenenada con azufre que provoca horribles quemaduras.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_deco_nor_ice.value_original: Glacial breath that instantly freezes the Hydra's hunters.
unit_abilities_tooltip_text_deco_nor_ice.value_translated: Aliento glacial que congela instantáneamente a los cazadores de la Hidra.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_deco_nor_shi.value_original: Shield Maidens train constantly in the use of their shields, using them to parry both blows and arrows with ease.
unit_abilities_tooltip_text_deco_nor_shi.value_translated: Las Doncellas Escuderas se entrenan constantemente en el uso de sus escudos, utilizándolos para parar tanto los golpes como las flechas con facilidad.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_deco_nor_whi.value_original: With this devastating "tornado" attack, the Pit Fighters tear through the enemy ranks hacking recklessly at foes around them.
unit_abilities_tooltip_text_deco_nor_whi.value_translated: Con este devastador ataque en forma de "tornado", los Luchadores del Foso atraviesan las filas enemigas cortando temerariamente a los enemigos que los rodean.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_str_urgat_ro.value_original: "Keep rollin', rollin', rollin', rollin' (what), Keep rollin', rollin', rollin', rollin' (come on), Keep rollin', rollin', rollin', rollin' (yeah), Keep rollin', rollin', rollin', rollin'!"

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_str_urgat_wo.value_original: As the three wolves drag the chariot towards the enemy, they howl at the top of their lungs.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh3_dlc23_un.value_original: The body of this creature radiates molten heat that weakens any foe close enough to attack.
unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh3_dlc23_un.value_translated: El cuerpo de esta criatura irradia un calor fundido que debilita a cualquier enemigo lo suficientemente cerca como para atacar.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc04_uni.value_original: Having beaten themselves insensible, the Doom Prophets no longer feel mortal injuries, shrugging aside blows that would cripple a sane man!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_unit.value_original: The battle-hardened Big Bosses are known for their brutal attacks.
unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_unit.value_translated: Los Grandes Jefes endurecidos por la batalla son conocidos por sus brutales ataques.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_unit.value_original: As these dung riders charge into battle, the stench drives the enemies mad.
The ferocity of Savage Orc Big Bosses in battle is unmatched.
unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_unit.value_translated: La ferocidad del Gran Jefe Orco Zalvaje en la batalla es incomparable.

unit_description_historical_texts_text_s.value_original: Goblins of higher standing use three wolves to pull their chariots.

unit_description_short_texts_text_coloss.value_original: The squig is a ferocious beast, and one will never stop growing.The largest amongst them are called colossal squigs.
unit_description_short_texts_text_coloss.value_translated: El garrapato es una bestia feroz, y nunca dejará de crecer. Los más grandes son se denominan Garrapatos Colosales.

unit_description_short_texts_text_dec_be.value_original: Blessed with spectacular horns and raw physical power, Bestigors put others of their kind to shame.
unit_description_short_texts_text_dec_be.value_translated: Bendecidos con cuernos espectaculares y poder físico puro, los Bestigors superan con creces a otros de su especie.

unit_description_short_texts_text_dec_go.value_original: Grabbing the nearest heavy weapon, the Gors are sent into the fray with animalistic rage.
unit_description_short_texts_text_dec_go.value_translated: Agarrando el arma pesada más cercana, los Gors se lanzan a la refriega con una rabia animal.

unit_description_short_texts_text_dec_go.value_original: The Bestigor Champions keep trophies of enemies on them to inspire fear.
unit_description_short_texts_text_dec_go.value_translated: Los Campeones Bestigor llevan consigo trofeos de enemigos para inspirar miedo.

unit_description_short_texts_text_dec_he.value_original: The elite of the Black Knights bringing death from the skies on top of their skeletal hellsteeds.
unit_description_short_texts_text_dec_he.value_translated: La élite de los Caballeros Negros que traen la muerte desde los cielos sobre sus esqueléticos corceles infernales.

unit_description_short_texts_text_dec_hu.value_original: Indiscriminate hunters who dedicate their lives to the Savage Huntress.
unit_description_short_texts_text_dec_hu.value_translated: Cazadoras indiscriminadas que dedican su vida a la Cazadora Salvaje.

unit_description_short_texts_text_dec_ka.value_original: Champions of the Blood Knights, the Kastellans are nigh indestructible, riding with fangs bared through storms of arrow and shot.
unit_description_short_texts_text_dec_ka.value_translated: Campeones de los Caballeros Sangrientos, los Castellanos son casi indestructibles, cabalgando con los colmillos al descubierto a través de tormentas de flechas y disparos.

unit_description_short_texts_text_dec_la.value_original: The handmaidens of Queen Neferata herself; as beautiful as deadly.
unit_description_short_texts_text_dec_la.value_translated: Las doncellas de la mismísima Reina Neferata, tan bellas como letales.

unit_description_short_texts_text_dec_lo.value_original: High ranking officers of the Black Guard who were granted dragon steeds as rewards for loyalty.
unit_description_short_texts_text_dec_lo.value_translated: Oficiales de alto rango de la Guardia Negra a los que se les han permitido montar sobre dragones como recompensa por su lealtad.

unit_description_short_texts_text_dec_ma.value_original: Primordial and ferocious creatures, Magma Dragons are amongst the most malevolent and reclusive of the Dragon race.
unit_description_short_texts_text_dec_ma.value_translated: Criaturas primordiales y feroces, los Dragones de Magma se encuentran entre los más malévolos y solitarios de la raza Dragón.

unit_description_short_texts_text_dec_re.value_original: The animated remains of long dead warriors, Skeletons rise from the grave to serve their Master. They are slow, but relentless, marching ever on and on.
unit_description_short_texts_text_dec_re.value_translated: Los restos animados de guerreros muertos hace mucho tiempo, los esqueletos se levantan de sus tumbas para servir a su Maestro. Son lentos, pero implacables, y marchan sin cesar.

unit_description_short_texts_text_dec_sp.value_original: A horde of ethereal ghosts and vengeful apparitions that drift towards their warm-blooded victims with terrible inevitability.
unit_description_short_texts_text_dec_sp.value_translated: Una horda de fantasmas etéreos y apariciones vengativas que se dirigen hacia sus víctimas de sangre caliente con terrible inevitabilidad.

unit_description_short_texts_text_dec_to.value_original: A few Dark Elves choose to remain as Black Guard beyond the 200 years. The greatest of these are called the Tower Masters.
unit_description_short_texts_text_dec_to.value_translated: Unos pocos Elfos Oscuros deciden permanecer como Guardia Negra después de los 200 años. Los mejores son los llamados Maestros de la Torre.

unit_description_short_texts_text_deco_b.value_original: To be a Battle Wizard is to understand the power at the heart of the world, though such power is not weilded lightly.
Bugman’s Rangers put the tankards of his fine ale to good - albeit sometimes strange - use, like with these hurling machines.

unit_description_short_texts_text_deco_c.value_original: The most elite fighting units of religious fanatics among the Dawi Zharr.
unit_description_short_texts_text_deco_c.value_translated: Las unidades de combate de élite de fanáticos religiosos de entre los Dawi Zharr.

unit_description_short_texts_text_deco_c.value_original: Weapons teams carrying pyrotechnic marvels of mass destruction. They are usually volunteers who are either exceptionally brave or slightly insane.
unit_description_short_texts_text_deco_c.value_translated: Equipos de armas portando maravillas pirotécnicas de destrucción masiva. Normalmente son voluntarios extremadamente valientes, o un poco chiflados.

unit_description_short_texts_text_deco_c.value_original: Although crude and primitive compared to the arsenals of the Chaos Dwarfs, Hobgoblin spear chukkas can provide effective ranged support.
unit_description_short_texts_text_deco_c.value_translated: Aunque toscos y primitivos en comparación con los arsenales de los Enanos del Caos, los Lanzapinchoz Hobgoblin pueden proporcionar un apoyo a distancia eficaz.

unit_description_short_texts_text_deco_c.value_original: The bigger and nastier Bull Centaurs lead the stampede into battle.
unit_description_short_texts_text_deco_c.value_translated: Los Centauros Enanos más grandes y desagradables lideran la estampida hacia la batalla.

unit_description_short_texts_text_deco_c.value_original: Gnoblars are often enslaved by the Dawi-Zharr. In battle they throw small, spiked metal balls at the enemy, before inevitably getting slaughtered.
unit_description_short_texts_text_deco_c.value_translated: Los Gnoblars suelen ser esclavizados por los Dawi-Zharr. En batalla lanzan pequeñas bolas de metal con pinchos al enemigos, antes de que dicho enemigo los aniquile.

unit_description_short_texts_text_deco_c.value_original: Only a few Khans grow strong enough to lead an army of Hobgoblins; even less those that manage to command Chaos Dwarf warriors as well.
unit_description_short_texts_text_deco_c.value_translated: Sólo unos pocos Khan se vuelven lo suficientemente fuertes como para liderar un ejército de Hobgoblins; y muchos menos son además capaces de comandar un ejército de los Enanos del Caos.

unit_description_short_texts_text_deco_c.value_original: Occasionally the spiteful infighting within the ranks of the Hobgoblins will give birth to a successful and feared killer who will rise to prominence and be known as Khan.
unit_description_short_texts_text_deco_c.value_translated: Ocasionalmente, las rencorosas luchas internas dentro de las filas de los Hobgoblins darán origen a un exitoso y temido asesino que se alzará y será conocido como Khan.

unit_description_short_texts_text_deco_c.value_original: Great Sorcerers of the Hobgoblin race. Merciless, bitter and cunning like all their kin.
unit_description_short_texts_text_deco_c.value_translated: Grandes Hechiceros de la raza Hobgoblin. Despiadados, amargados y astutos como toda su raza.

unit_description_short_texts_text_deco_c.value_original: A rare breed of trolls that have been seen only in the Dark Lands.
unit_description_short_texts_text_deco_c.value_translated: Una raza rara de trolls que sólo se ha visto en las Tierras Oscuras.

unit_description_short_texts_text_deco_c.value_original: Naphtha bombs are made of sorcerous concoctions of sulphurous chemicals filtered through the essence of fire-daemons.
unit_description_short_texts_text_deco_c.value_translated: Las bombas de nafta están hechas con brebajes mágicos de sustancias químicas sulfurosas filtradas a través de la esencia de demonios de fuego.

unit_description_short_texts_text_deco_c.value_original: Ogres make good slaves for the Pits, and if needed they can be sent to the battlefield for brute force.
unit_description_short_texts_text_deco_c.value_translated: Los ogros son buenos esclavos para los Pozos y, si es necesario, pueden ser enviados al campo de batalla para usar su fuerza bruta.

unit_description_short_texts_text_deco_c.value_original: Crossbow regiments that provide ranged support to the shock troops and massed slaves that predominate the Dawi Zharr armies.
unit_description_short_texts_text_deco_c.value_translated: Regimientos de ballestas que brindan apoyo a distancia a las tropas de choque y esclavos en masa que predominan en los ejércitos de los Dawi Zharr.

unit_description_short_texts_text_deco_c.value_original: Also known as Hobyars, the nobles of the Mourngul Khanate are the only ones permitted to ride the carefully domesticated Hobhounds.
unit_description_short_texts_text_deco_c.value_translated: También conocidos como Hobyars, los nobles del Khanato Fúnebre son los únicos a los que se les permite montar los Hobsabuesos cuidadosamente domesticados.

unit_description_short_texts_text_deco_c.value_original: These hulking behemoths combine the strength of the Giant race with the nigh-impenetrable armour of their masters.
unit_description_short_texts_text_deco_c.value_translated: Estos gigantes descomunales combinan la fuerza de la raza Gigante con la armadura casi impenetrable de sus amos.

unit_description_short_texts_text_deco_c.value_original: The Berzerkers work themselves into a frenzy before going into battle with the use of potent drugs mixed with blood.
unit_description_short_texts_text_deco_c.value_translated: Los Berzerkers se vuelven frenéticos antes de entrar en batalla con el uso de potentes drogas mezcladas con sangre.

unit_description_short_texts_text_deco_d.value_original: With howls of doom on their lips, they throw themselves into the fray, heedless of danger or injury.

unit_description_short_texts_text_deco_h.value_original: Outfitted in heavy, well-polished Dwarf mail, Hammerers wade into combat swinging their hammers in sweeping arcs.
South of the Empire lies a barren plain of hills at the edge of the Badlands. It is there that the largest and nastiest of all Goblins can be found.

unit_description_short_texts_text_deco_i.value_original: Each if these Irondrakes carries a pair of finely tuned Drake Pistols, with mechanisms that are still a mystery to Imperial engineers.
Clad in heavy plate armour and armed with master-wrought blackpowder firearms, they are one of the most widely respected and well-equipped handgunner regiments.

unit_description_short_texts_text_deco_k.value_original: Averlanders consider the Knights Black Lynx the elite of the elite among the Mountain Guard, stationed within Black Fire Pass.

unit_description_short_texts_text_deco_n.value_original: Young and inexperienced, the Bondsmen are loyal warriors who are usually in the service of a particular Jarl.
unit_description_short_texts_text_deco_n.value_translated: Jóvenes e inexpertos, los Mozuelos son guerreros leales que suelen estar al servicio de un Jarl en particular.

unit_description_short_texts_text_deco_n.value_original: Fierce men who earned a place in the hall of a Chieftain who values their skill in combat.
unit_description_short_texts_text_deco_n.value_translated: Hombres feroces que se ganaron un lugar en el salón de un caudillo que valora su habilidad en el combate.

unit_description_short_texts_text_deco_n.value_original: Legends speak of a rare variation of this horrible creature, that prefers to live in the dark and frozen caverns of the North.
unit_description_short_texts_text_deco_n.value_translated: Las leyendas hablan de una rara variante de esta horrible criatura, que prefiere vivir en las oscuras y heladas cavernas del Norte.

unit_description_short_texts_text_deco_n.value_original: The Jarl is the most battle hardened veteran of his group and often a lesser clan chieftain of his tribe.
unit_description_short_texts_text_deco_n.value_translated: El Jarl es el veterano más curtido en la batalla de su grupo y a menudo un jefe de clan menor de su tribu.

unit_description_short_texts_text_deco_n.value_original: Respected by the Jarls of many Norse clans, the Shield Maidens are deadly warriors swift of movement and of blade.
unit_description_short_texts_text_deco_n.value_translated: Respetadas por los jarls de muchos clanes norses, las Doncellas Escuderas son guerreras mortales, rápidas de movimiento y de espada.

unit_description_short_texts_text_deco_n.value_original: Barbarians seeking excitement, wealth or glory in the pit. Most find naught but a brutal death.
unit_description_short_texts_text_deco_n.value_translated: Bárbaros que buscan emoción, riqueza o gloria en el foso. La mayoría no encuentra más que una muerte brutal.

unit_description_short_texts_text_deco_n.value_original: Among the most feared mariners are the Norse Reavers, brutal warriors who plunder the coastlines.
unit_description_short_texts_text_deco_n.value_translated: Entre los marineros más temidos están los Corsarios Norse, guerreros brutales que saquean las costas.

unit_description_short_texts_text_deco_n.value_original: The mere sight of one of these in battle greatly drives the Norsemen to never falter and achieve great deeds.
unit_description_short_texts_text_deco_n.value_translated: La mera visión de una de estas en batalla impulsa enormemente a los Norses a no desfallecer nunca y lograr grandes hazañas.

unit_description_short_texts_text_deco_n.value_original: There are tales of a great wolf wandering the Island of Albion. A wolf that once fought alongside Mortkin, the Black-Iron Reaver.
unit_description_short_texts_text_deco_n.value_translated: La gente dice que un gran lobo vive en la Isla de Albión... Un lobo que una vez luchó junto a Mortkin, el Saqueador Negro.

unit_description_short_texts_text_deco_o.value_original: Also known as Great Beards, the Old Guard are the oldest and wisest among the dwarf clans.

unit_description_short_texts_text_deco_p.value_original: Experienced miners, the Prospectors can dig tunnels with impressive speed and accuracy.

unit_description_short_texts_text_deco_r.value_original: Roadwardens are the local law-enforcement force created and assigned the important duty of protecting valuable trade and commercial travel within the Empire.

unit_description_short_texts_text_dwf_ko.value_original: A true marvel of engineering, the Dreadnaught is the pinnacle of Dawi machinery.

unit_description_short_texts_text_forest.value_original: The leaders of the Spider Kults are even more cunning than the regular Goblin Warbosses.
unit_description_short_texts_text_forest.value_translated: Los líderes del Kulto de la Araña son incluso más astutos que los Kaudillos Goblins habituales.

unit_description_short_texts_text_grn_ar.value_original: The ability to skewer several creatures from a distance appeals greatly to the violent and bloody nature of any greenskin.

unit_description_short_texts_text_grn_po.value_original: The Goblin Shamans sometimes provide the Snotlings with these curious (and smelly) mounts to ride.

unit_description_short_texts_text_savage.value_original: Bound in huge bulging muscles, the Savage Orc Big Boss wades through battle hacking off heads and limbs.
unit_description_short_texts_text_savage.value_translated: Con enormes músculos abultados, el Gran Jefe Orco Zalvaje entra en la batalla cortando cabezas y extremidades.

unit_description_short_texts_text_savage.value_original: The Savage Orc leaders typically bear the most impressive warpaint or take the tribal customs to the most extreme level.
unit_description_short_texts_text_savage.value_translated: Los líderes de los Orcos Salvajes suelen llevar la pintura de guerra más impresionante o llevar las costumbres tribales al nivel más extremo.

unit_description_short_texts_text_str_ur.value_original: Goblins of higher standing use three wolves to pull their chariots.

unit_description_short_texts_text_wh3_dl.value_original: "You are the Immortals. You are without pain. You are without fear. You are without death."
unit_description_short_texts_text_wh3_dl.value_translated: "Vosotros sois los Inmortales. No sufrís dolor. No tenéis miedo. No conoceis la muerte".

unit_description_short_texts_text_wh_grn.value_original: Orcs are led by the biggest and brawniest of their kind.
unit_description_short_texts_text_wh_grn.value_translated: Los orcos están dirigidos por los más grandes y fornidos de su especie.

unit_description_short_texts_text_wh_mai.value_original: Give a Black Orc two weapons, and watch the carnage they create double itself.
unit_description_short_texts_text_wh_mai.value_translated: Dale dos armas a un Orco Negro y observa cómo la masacre que crea se duplica.

unit_description_short_texts_text_wh_mai.value_original: "Now den, sum times what da boyz need is a lad what can take a beating, and beat back! A lad wif a serious pair of tusks! Dem need a Black Orc!"
unit_description_short_texts_text_wh_mai.value_translated: "A vecez lo que un chico necezita ez otro chico al que darle una paliza, ¡y que zea capaz de devolverla! ¡Un chico con un buen par de colmilloz! ¡Necezitan un Orco Negro!"

unit_description_short_texts_text_wh_mai.value_original: The skirmishers of the Forest Goblins screen the fields and soften the enemy with a rain of arrows before the real fighting begins.
Used more to support troops than fight head on, these gobbos happily trust their pointies in the enemies back.
Armed with a poison sword and tribal shield, these small gobbos form the backbone of the Forest Goblin infantry.
Night goblins who prefer to stab from a longer distance then their sword friends.
Orc Boyz call every weapon a "choppa" even the long pointy-ones.
unit_description_short_texts_text_wh_mai.value_translated: Los Guerreroz Orcoz llaman a todas las armas "choppa", incluso las largas y puntiagudas.

unit_description_short_texts_text_wh_mai.value_original: The true elite of the Savage Orcs. Wielding large bone clubs to crack some skullz.
unit_description_short_texts_text_wh_mai.value_translated: La verdadera élite de los Orcoz Zalvajez. Usan grandes garrotes de hueso para cascar craneoz.

unit_description_short_texts_text_wh_mai.value_original: If a giant finds itself among a horde of savage orcs it will usually adopt their customs and be given their war paints.
unit_description_short_texts_text_wh_mai.value_translated: Si un gigante se encuentra entre una horda de orcoz zalvajez, normalmente adoptará sus costumbres y recibirá sus pinturas de guerra.

unit_description_short_texts_text_wh_mai.value_original: Even with primitive wooden shields and spears reinforced with bone, these savage brutes are "readi for 'scrappin".
unit_description_short_texts_text_wh_mai.value_translated: Incluso con primitivos escudos de madera y lanzas reforzadas con hueso, estos brutos salvajes están "listoz pa desguazar".

unit_description_short_texts_text_wh_mai.value_original: In battle, these "Gretchin" rely on their small size and sheer numbers to swarm the enemy.
Orcs are led by the biggest and brawniest of their kind.
unit_description_short_texts_text_wh_mai.value_translated: Los orcos están dirigidos por los más grandes y fornidos de su especie.

units_custom_battle_mounts_localised_des.value_original: A general's horse can be their most trusted and daring companion. Just don't name him 'Daisy'.
An Imperial pegasus is a noble, winged steed, intelligent and loyal.
A general's horse can be their most trusted and daring companion. Just don't name him 'Daisy'.
"Da Khan getz da biggest barka', nuff sed."
units_custom_battle_mounts_localised_des.value_translated: "Er Khan conzigue al que maz ladra, y zacabó".

units_custom_battle_mounts_localised_des.value_original: Tainted and savage they may be, but these behemoths remain willing to bear high-status Marauders into battle, trampling flat everything foolish enough to get in their way.
units_custom_battle_mounts_localised_des.value_translated: Puede que sean salvajes y corruptos, pero estos monstruos están dispuestos a acompañar a los Bárbaros más prestigiosos a la batalla, pisoteando a todo aquel lo bastante lerdo como para interponerse en su camino.

units_custom_battle_mounts_localised_des.value_original: The horses of Norsca live for battle, even choosing to graze on the bones of the fallen over grass.
units_custom_battle_mounts_localised_des.value_translated: Los caballos de Norsca viven para la batalla, llegando incluso a elegir como pasto los huesos de los caídos.

units_custom_battle_mounts_localised_des.value_original: When fully grown, these Gigantic Spiders are prized as revered mounts for a Goblin tribe's mightiest warriors.
units_custom_battle_mounts_localised_des.value_translated: Cuando están completamente desarrolladas, estas arañas gigantes son apreciadas como monturas veneradas por los guerreros más poderosos de los Goblins.

units_custom_battle_mounts_localised_des.value_original: Giant Spiders are deadly hunters, easily capable of ensnaring and overwhelming a fully-grown man.
units_custom_battle_mounts_localised_des.value_translated: Las Arañas Gigantes son cazadoras mortales, fácilmente capaces de atrapar y abrumar a un hombre adulto.

units_custom_battle_mounts_localised_des.value_original: These large and aggressive beasts can be found almost exclusively in the harsh rugged regions of the Badlands.
units_custom_battle_mounts_localised_des.value_translated: Estas grandes y agresivas bestias se encuentran casi únicamente en las regiones escarpadas de las Tierras Yermas.

units_custom_battle_mounts_localised_des.value_original: These large and aggressive beasts can be found almost exclusively in the harsh rugged regions of the Badlands.
units_custom_battle_mounts_localised_des.value_translated: Estas grandes y agresivas bestias se encuentran casi únicamente en las regiones escarpadas de las Tierras Yermas.

units_custom_battle_mounts_localised_des.value_original: Wyverns are highly-prized mounts for the most powerful of Orc Warlords.
units_custom_battle_mounts_localised_des.value_translated: Las Serpientes Aladas son monturas muy apreciadas por los Kaudillos Orcos más poderosos.
